AboutBanner.Title: Some facts about me
AboutBanner.Description:
My name is Denis and I am 17 years old.
I've been interested in programming since school, and I've participated in computer science and programming competitions many times.
Now I'm learning TypeScript and Java because I want to develop web and desktop applications.
Apart from programming, I like to listen to music, usually electronic music (my favorite genres are Dubstep, Phonk, Phunk, Electro House)
Facts: Wanna develop desktop and mobile apps
I like electronic music, especially phonk, dubstep and electro house
